Class ECIPlant

java.lang.Object
domain.Character
domain.Plant
domain.Support
domain.ECIPlant
public class ECIPlant extends Support
ECIPlant is a specialized type of Support plant. It inherits from the Support class to provide specific behavior and initial configuration compatible with the game's mechanics.

  • Field Summary

    sunValue, time

  • Constructor Details

    • ECIPlant

      public ECIPlant()
      Constructs a new instance of ECIPlant with predefined attributes. The ECIPlant is initialized with specified hit points, cost in sun points, sun value generation rate, and generation interval. It uses the superclass Support's constructor to provide these specific values: hit points set to 150, sun cost to 75, a sun value of 50, and a time interval of 20 seconds for sun generation.

  • Method Details

    • generateSun

      public void generateSun()
      Generates a large sun if the maximum allowed number of suns has not yet been reached. This method updates the internal counter and prints a message indicating that a sun has been generated. The maximum number of suns is determined by the `maxSolesGenerados` field.
      Overrides:
      generateSun in class Support

    • checkAndGenerateSunWhenOutOfSuns

      public void checkAndGenerateSunWhenOutOfSuns(int currentSuns)
      Checks if the current number of suns is zero and generates a sun if the maximum number of generated suns has not been reached.
      Parameters:
      currentSuns - the current number of suns available. If this value is zero, the method will attempt to generate a new sun.

    • getSolesGenerados

      public int getSolesGenerados()
      Retrieves the current number of suns generated by the ECIPlant.
      Returns:
      the current count of suns generated as an integer.
